channel.title: How to fix these little errors?
channel.description: [code]client.java:7786: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pure location: class client if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0 && pure == 0) ^ client.java:7814: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pure location: class client pure += 1; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: How to fix these little errors?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

Here it comes:

Search in client.java for :

public int

Add under that:

public int pure = 0;

Look in client java for:

} else if (token.equals("character-mutedate")) { mutedate = Integer.parseInt(token2);

under that add:

} else if (token.equals("character-pure")) { pure = Integer.parseInt(token2);

look for :

characterfile.write("character-mutedate = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(mutedate), 0, Integer.toString(mutedate).length()); characterfile.newLine();

under that add:

characterfile.write("character-pure = ", 0, 17); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pure), 0, Integer.toString(pure).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix these little errors?
